Settings.Name: Enable Regeneration
Settings.Description:
Enable or disable the regeneration functions.
If enabled, you can still disable individual settings by setting the turn timer to 0.
One turn in combat is equal to 6 seconds out of combat.

Settings.Name: Fully Restore Resources
Settings.Description: If enabled, all enabled resources will be fully restored instead of regenerating gradually based on their configured turn values.

Settings.Name: Out of Combat Regeneration
Settings.Description: Enable regeneration out of combat.

Settings.Name: Combat Regeneration
Settings.Description: Enable regeneration during combat.

Settings.Name: Enable Debug Logging
Settings.Description: Enabling will log regeneration events to the console for debugging purposes.

Settings.Name: Long Rest
Settings.Description: Turns required to reset 'per Long Rest' cooldowns.

Settings.Name: Short Rest
Settings.Description: Turns required to reset 'per Short Rest' cooldowns.
